snippet: The Australian Will Power earned another point in his bid to clinch his first IndyCar Series championship this weekend.
abstract: Australian IndyCar driver Will Power captures pole position for Grand Prix of Baltimore and earns another point in his bid to clinch his first IndyCar Series championship.
lead_paragraph: The Australian Will Power earned another point in his bid to clinch his first IndyCar Series championship this weekend.

headline.seo: Will Power Captures Pole in Grand Prix of Baltimore
headline.main: Power Captures Pole in Grand Prix of Baltimore
